Class SharedData

java.lang.Object
SharedData
public class SharedData extends Object
This class represents a shared data object that holds: - an array of integers - a boolean array (for win flags or similar purposes) - a final integer value - a flag (boolean) Used to share data between different components or threads.
Author:
Noam darlinger, Gal mitrani
